title: User
description: Schema for a user document in the Firestore 'users' collection.

photo_url.description: Image path / URL to the user's profile photo.

created_time.description: Timestamp when the user document was created, stored as a Firestore timestamp and represented as an ISO 8601 string.

uid.description: Firebase Auth UID / primary identifier for the user.

phone_number.description: User's phone number as a string.

organizationRef.description: Document reference to an organization document (e.g. 'organizations/{orgId}').

role.description: Role of the user within the organization or app (e.g. 'admin', 'member', etc.).
